text: Aleksander "Olek" Balcerowski (born 19 November 2000) is a Polish professional basketball player for Herbalife Gran Canaria in the Spanish Spanish Basketball Supercup.https://eurospects.com/?p=15535https://www.nbadraft.net/players/aleksander- balcerowskihttps://www.proballers.com/basketball/player/75737/aleksander- balcerowski He also represented Poland at the 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup.http://www.fiba.basketball/basketballworldcup/2019/news/balcerowski- youngest-player-in-the-world-cup-represents-poland-s-bright- futurehttps://www.eurohoops.net/en/fibawc/924906/poland-presents-world-cup- squad/ ==References== ==External links== *Olek Balcerowski on RealGM Category:Living people Category:2000 births Category:CB Gran Canaria players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Liga ACB players Category:Polish basketball players
title: Aleksander Balcerowski
